name: Signal Of Silence
description:
Game description

Play as a signalman Vladimir who went to the battlefield as soon as the WW2 started. Avoid enemy soldiers, deliver information using your radio in morse code and find documents that unveil historical facts about WW2.

Your comrade’s lives are in your hands!

Developed by a group of enthusiasts calling themselves “SHUBRIUM” in 2 weeks.

Controls:

– movement – WASD

– Sprint – Shift

– Stealth– Ctrl

– Action – F

– Camera– Q/E

– Menu – Esc.

The game is not finished yet. If you find a bug please let us know.
